thread.title: Beyonce Will Perform at Grammys 2017, Spotted at Rehearsals!
thread.title_full: Beyonce Will Perform at Grammys 2017, Spotted at Rehearsals!

author: Just Jared
title: Beyonce Will Perform at Grammys 2017, Spotted at Rehearsals!
text:
Beyonce is set to hit the stage at the 2017 Grammy Awards for a highly anticipated performance!
The 35-year-old entertainer, who is pregnant with twins, will be making her first performance since exciting her familyâ€™s happy news. She is nominated for nine awards at the show next weekend, including Album of the Year for Lemonade .
It was expected that Beyonce would perform at the show for weeks and while there has not been an official announcement, sources confirmed the news to Billboard and she was also spotted rehearsing for the performance, according to Entertainment Tonight .
Make sure to see Beyonce baring her baby bump in her stunning pregnancy photos and also check out her schedule for all her big moments planned for 2017!
